column1: Screen reader users: There is 1 table on this tab called Table 26: Living-donor kidney transplants by province of treatment, adult recipients, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (number). Table 26  Living-donor kidney transplants by province of treatment, adult recipients, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (number)
Data from Quebec was excluded from this table because of significant under-reporting of transplant data between 2012 and 2021.
Canadian Organ Replacement Register, 2022, Canadian Institute for Health Information.
